ygData.subject: Gnoll hide lariat (was My Yk!!!)
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone offered to sell me one of these yesterday for 250PP. I had just bought the rubies for my LB so was broke.  Wasn t sure if I even wanted it. I currently
ygData.messageBody:
Someone offered to sell me one of these yesterday for 250PP. I had just
bought the rubies for my LB so was broke. Wasn't sure if I even wanted it.
I currently wield a dragoon dirk in my off-hand and a runed bone fork in my
range slot. If I got the lariat, would drop the dragoon dirk and keep the
runed bone fork in the ranged slot. Opinions: does the stun effect and
extra AC offset the lower damage rating?

Galtin of E'ci


> Gnoll hide lariat, dropped in new Paw
> Damage: 3
> Delay: 20
> AC: 3 (thought this was kinda weird, but no complaint)
> Effect: Stun
>
> Bought a pair for 300p to save a trip, they're quite fun to play with,
> especially in an offbalanced group (tank- or caster-heavy).
>
>
